title: Dear Riot
body:
I just thought of a really cool skin idea that I think you could pass on to the Skin creation team. I thought of it myself and it is for Kayne. Christmas is coming up so I thought of a skin called "Candy Kayne". He could actually wield a candy cane and have really cool effects. If this idea goes through please mention that it was from me. Thanks

Kind regards,

Xenomazul
